column4: what should i do to translate ubuntu installer to my language (Latvian)?
im not sure but ask the debian installer guys how they handle their translations?
well, that would be a start, but isn't ubuntu installer branched from the debian one?

yes but i have no idea how translations are done, its probably gettext but i dunno so find out how theyre done then get the files out of the ubuntu installer and send file a bug for ubuntu with the translation?
